itemDescription: Welsh international lawn and indoor bowler

wikipedia_page.main: Mark Williams is a Welsh international lawn and indoor bowler.Williams won a fours gold medal at the 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Johannesburg with Stephen Rees, Will Thomas and Robert Weale.

link_mentions.page: 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship – Men's fours
response: Mark Williams, Robert Weale, Stephen Rees and Will Thomas of Wales won the gold medal.

link_mentions.page: 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship – Men's triples
response: |3 || align="left"| Mark Williams, Stephen Rees & Will Thomas           || 10 || 8 || 0 || 2 || 198 || 141 || 16 || +57

Thomas won a silver medal in the fours at the 1996 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Adelaide. Four years later he won a fours gold medal at the 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Johannesburg with Stephen Rees, Mark Williams and Robert Weale.
